summary: Completed backend API testing for Phase 6 (Partner Dashboard) and Phase 7 (Audit Integration). All 24 tests passed successfully. APIs correctly implement read-only partner dashboards with strict data isolation.
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is excellent - well-documented with clear data contracts
Security: All endpoints properly enforce authentication via session_token cookie
Security: Partner data isolation working correctly - partners cannot access other partners' data
Security: Tenant internals (users, settings, domains) are NOT exposed in referral data
The partner-dashboard.ts service has comprehensive type definitions and follows read-only principles
seed_data_creation: Test data was pre-seeded by main agent: 1 partner (Test Partner Inc), 1 partner user, 1 agreement (15% commission), 1 referral (Acme Corporation), 1 earning ($15), 4 audit logs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Partner Dashboard and Audit APIs are working correctly. Test file at /app/tests/test_partner_dashboard_audit.py covers: dashboard overview, performance metrics, referrals list, audit logs, activity reports, authentication, and partner data isolation. Cookie name is 'session_token' not 'session'.

api_verification_summary.GET /api/partners/{partnerId}/dashboard: PASS - Returns complete dashboard with partner info, summary, earnings, referrals, and recent activity
api_verification_summary.GET /api/partners/{partnerId}/dashboard/: PASS - Returns performance metrics with configurable date range
PASS - Returns paginated referrals with limited tenant data only
api_verification_summary.GET /api/partners/{partnerId}/audit: PASS - Returns audit logs with pagination
api_verification_summary.GET /api/partners/{partnerId}/audit?repo: PASS - Returns activity report with summary
api_verification_summary.Authentication (session_token cookie): PASS - All endpoints require valid session_token
api_verification_summary.Partner Data Isolation: PASS - Partners cannot access other partners' data (returns 403/404)
api_verification_summary.Tenant Internals Hidden: PASS - No users, settings, domains, or modules exposed
